alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued December 12 at 5:48AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...THE FOREST SERVICE UTAH AVALANCHE CENTER IN SALT LAKE CITY HAS ISSUED A BACKCOUNTRY AVALANCHE WARNING WHICH IS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MST MONDAY MORNING TO 6 AM MST TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Very dangerous avalanche conditions exist and the avalanche danger is HIGH. * WHERE...For the Wasatch Mountains north of I-80 and the Bear River Range. * WHEN...From 6 AM MST Monday morning to 6 AM MST Tuesday morning * IMPACTS...Very strong south winds and heavy snowfall have overloaded the snowpack creating unstable conditions. Avalanches are likely even at low elevations and on small slopes. Stay off of and out from under slopes steeper than 30 degrees. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Stay off of and out from under slopes steeper than 30 degrees. Backcountry travelers should consult www.utahavalanchecenter.org or call 1-888-999-4019 for more detailed information. This Warning does not apply to ski areas where avalanche hazard reduction measures are performed.
